short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart keyword SEO tool for Etsy, find Etsy listing tags, one click to copy all Etsy listing tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows Etsy sellers to easily find relevant tags and keywords from competitor product listings.

Etsy Tag Scraper - Etsy keywords extractor

Why you need it:
Tags and keywords are crucial for SEO on Etsy. Proper tagging helps your listings rank higher and get more views from customers.

How it works:

1. Browse any Etsy product listing
2. Click the Copy tags button
3. All tags from the listing will be automatically copied
4. Paste tags into your own listings for optimized SEO

Key Features:

1. One click tag copying
2. Extract tags from any Etsy listing page
3. Save time finding keywords manually
4. Boost your listing visibility with targeted competitor tags

Notes:

1. This extension only supports English language Etsy sites for now
2. Make sure your Etsy shop and browser are set to English

By analyzing top sellers, you can leverage their successful tags without reinventing the wheel. This extension streamlines the keyword research process for improved Etsy SEO and more traffic/sales.

------------------------------------------
Data Privacy
------------------------------------------
All data is processed in your local computer, it is never passing through our web server, no one knows what you explore. The extension will NOT attempt to offload, distribute, broadcast, sell, or in any way share collected data.
